Canada's Michael Smith Genome Sciences Centre at BC Cancer

Bioinformatics BioApplications Co-op Position

The Genome Sciences Centre (GSC) is a leading international organization for genomics and bioinformatics research. Our mandate is to advance knowledge in those areas, and to realize the social and economic benefits of genomics research. The BioApps group at the GSC is looking for co-op students to join us in this endeavor to help develop some new features to aid in bioinformatics tracking. This position will include web application development as well as database development.

Prior experience in a bioinformatics setting is an asset, but not required.
The position is available for a 4-month term with the possibility of extension to 8 months.

Work Term: May 5, 2025 to December 31, 2025

Salary: $19.14 per hour or $2,110.25 monthly plus 8.6% in lieu of benefits

Work Hours: 37.5 hours per week

Work Location: Echelon site, 570 West 7th Ave., Vancouver, BC V5Z 4S6

Supervisor: Tina Wong - Assistant Bioinformatics Coordinator

Team: BioApplications Team

Conditions: Applicant must have a valid work permit.

EDI Statement: We believe that equity, diversity and inclusivity are essential for the advancement of human knowledge and science.

We are looking for:

Programming experience with Python
Experience in a Linux environment
Experience with web or API development
Experience with MySQL or Postgres would be an asset
Knowledge of database queries and design
Knowledge of metadata tracking in the database and file system
Knowledge of biology (genome, DNA, RNA, central dogma of molecular biology)
Strong verbal communication skills and willingness to work in a team
Ability to think critically and troubleshoot complex problems
Enthusiasm for designing user interfaces and visual displays

Prior experience in a bioinformatics setting is an asset, but not required.

Conditions: Applicant must have a valid work permit.

EDI Statement: We believe that equity, diversity and inclusivity are essential for the advancement of human knowledge and science.

Please note all jobs at the GSC are based onsite in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. Flexible work options may be available for this position (currently at 3 days per week onsite) upon request and is subject to change in accordance with GSC's operational needs and PHSA's Flexible Work Options Policy.
